Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Relates to requiring SUNY and CUNY to offer abortion by medication techniques at all on-campus student health centers at colleges or universities within the SUNY and CUNY systems
Summary: Requires SUNY and CUNY to offer abortion by medication techniques at all on-campus student health centers at colleges or universities within the SUNY and CUNY systems; creates a fund to help finance the implementation of offering such services at SUNY and CUNY on-campus student health centers.
LawCode: Add Art 129-C ยง6450, Ed L; add ยง99-qq, St Fin L; add ยง630-l, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, the state finance law and the tax law, in relation to requiring the state university of New York and the city university of New York to provide abortion by medication techniques at all public colleges and public universities within the state
